message:
Hello #civictech friends in Taiwan. I am looking for beta testers for my new TV News app on Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stevenclift.tvnewsapp

It leverages the YouTube API and features world news stream live in multiple languages and on-demand in English. Feedback appreciated!

I am amazed by all the live news channels from Taiwan on YouTube. You must live news.
story: Steven Clift shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
name: TV News - News Video App
